The Empire is a residential complex consisting of two identical towers of 33 and 37 floors. The towers consist of a total of 104 apartments, including four penthouses with floor space ranging from  to around . The  towers are built on a 1.03-acre site where the old Empire Theatre once stood.
See also
* List of tallest structures in Sri Lanka
References
